Compute Zoom optics focus corrector open loop transfer function.

Parameters:
[in] nu frequency.
[in] fs sampling frequency
[in] tau time delay
[in] zeta dampling of zoom corrector
[in] fzc frequency of zoom corrector

static double nafocus_NaPSD ( double  nu,
double  alpha,
double  beta 
) [inline, static]

Compute sodium power spectrum density.

alpha, beta are the parameters of the sodium power spectrum obtained by fitting measurement data at UBC.

double nafocus_residual ( double  fs,
double  tau,
double  zcf,
double  zeta,
double  D,
double  hs,
double  alpha,
double  beta 
)

Sodium tracking Openloop transfer function.

The cross over frequency (where gain is 1) have a phase margin of 45 (angle(Hol)=-135).

First find the frequency fc where phase margin is 45. then scale Hol to have gain of 1 at fc.

Written: 2010-06-15 Tested ok against RC's skycoverage code: 2010-06-15.

Parameters:
[in] fs sampling frequency of NGS
[in] tau zoom corrector time delay
[in] zcf zoom corrector frequency (Hz)
[in] zeta zoom corrector sampling
[in] D telescope diameter
[in] hs guide star altitude
[in] alpha parameter of sodium layer height PSD.
[in] beta parameter of sodium layer height PSD.
